chunks.title: How to Send Tokens
chunks.body: Complete guide for sending tokens using NYLA through social media. Follow these steps to transfer tokens securely via X.com posts.
chunks.summary_en: Step-by-step guide for sending tokens through NYLA with social verification on X.com.
chunks.summary_zh: 通过NYLA在X.com上进行社交验证发送代币的分步指南。

steps.action: Open NYLAGo and click Send tab
steps.details: Navigate to NYLAGo interface and select the 'Send' tab to access the transfer form with recipient, amount, and network fields.
Type the recipient's X.com username WITHOUT the @ symbol. For example, if sending to @alice, just enter 'alice'.
Choose the token type (SOL, ETH, ALGO, etc.) and enter the exact amount you want to send. Double-check the amount is correct.
Select the blockchain network that matches your token (Solana for SOL, Ethereum for ETH, Algorand for ALGO). Network MUST match token type.
Verify recipient username, token amount, network selection, and estimated fees. Make sure all details are correct before proceeding.
Click 'Generate Command' to create the NYLA transfer command. Copy the generated command text to your clipboard.
Go to X.com, create a new post, paste the NYLA command, and publish the post. The transfer will be processed automatically.
NYLA will reply to your post with transfer confirmation and transaction details. This usually takes 30-60 seconds.

pitfalls.solution: Always match network to token type (SOL→Solana, ETH→Ethereum, ALGO→Algorand). Cross-chain transfers are not supported.
Enter username without @ symbol. Use 'alice' not '@alice'.
Check wallet balance includes amount + network fees. Add more funds if needed.
Ensure command is copied exactly as generated. Avoid editing the command text.
Network congestion may delay transfers. Wait up to 10 minutes or check transaction hash on blockchain explorer.
